Dear ##NickName##,

Happy 4th of July to you and your family!

Thank you for serving at this year's ROAR Vacation Bible School and contributing to its great success!! God certainly moved that week as we had dozens of kids pray to accept Christ during our Wednesday story and nearly $400 donated to the mission project for Zambia!

If it wasn't for you and volunteers like you, the VBS programming would not have been possible, we would not have witnessed new professions of faith for the 25 kids and $400 less would be going to Zambia.

We were all willing to go forward when the need was made known and God moved right along with us. What an amazing blessing to see fruits of VBS already and how wonderful to know this is only the beginning for the NOW Gen!

I encourage you to keep being willing, keep serving. If you aren't serving in a ministry area yet and want to know more about doing so, whether it's kids, students, life groups, guest services- reach out to me or other team leaders or staff and we'll help you take the next steps!

Thank you greatly,

Erin Brindle, Kids Minister
ebrindle@crosspoint.church
